Getting started

Welcome to your online speaking course. This course is a mixture of studying online lessons with your Tutor and some self study lessons. Please use this course to book all your online speaking lessons.

Get Skype for your online lessons

Our teachers use Skype to contact you for booked lessons. In order for teachers to contact you for a lesson you need to install Skype.

If you don't have Skype please install it from here

Teacher Introduction

Hello there students, it is my pleasure to teach you English language here in QQE.
I'll make sure that you will be comfortable in learning English language from me. I'll make sure also that you will have fun in our class because we will have lots of exciting activities.
So I am looking forward to see you in one of my classes. Have a good day ahead!

Eunice
